content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 3, Bolton Wanderers 0.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 3, Bolton Wanderers 0.
Goal!  West Ham United 3, Bolton Wanderers 0. Arthur Masuaku (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by André Ayew.
Attempt blocked. André Ayew (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Nathan Holland.
Chicharito (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Darren Pratley (Bolton Wanderers).
Nathan Holland (West Ham United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jack Earing (Bolton Wanderers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nathan Holland (West Ham United).

Darren Pratley (Bolton Wanderers) is shown the yellow card for dangerous play.
Dangerous play by Darren Pratley (Bolton Wanderers).
Adrián (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
